::DarkMouse::

She looked at Scorponok.  She then looked at Megatron.  Her nose 
still twitched and gave her that edgy feeling.  She tunred to 
Panzertron.  "An allience would be mutually beneficail.  We would 
both profit from it. When we win the beast wars, the rewards will be 
great for both teams. I say let's join forces and unite to create the 
most power force on this planet.  We would be unstoppable."
She turned to Megatron.  She hoped that he would be pleased by her 
words and not have her terminated for talking out of place.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, crow_lord@h... wrote:
> Scorponok
> 
> 
>    Scorponok quickly answered the question Allitron asked Megatron, 
> "you would gain an ally in this  war and if you ever need to run we 
> could house you for a little while, and if you don't allied with 
us, 
> then we might just have to kill you." Scorponok says all this then 
> adds a nervous laugh. "It would be the best for everyone, except 
for 
> our enemys, if we join forces." Scorponok looks over to Darkmouse 
and 
> gives a nervous grin.
